name: On Your Mark
detailed_description:
On Your Mark is a first-person Magic game for VR. You will be in a strange temple. Faced with monsters from different worlds, you can use different weapons to deal with different monsters. You can also compete with the legendary dragon.



Different weapons have different attributes, physical attack, magic type, summon type, different stages of using different weapons will be the only way to defeat monsters, pick up weapons, start fighting!



The dragon has five different stages. Mastering the different attacking ways of the Dragon skillfully is an important skill for you to live and defeat him. Only with good reaction ability and perseverance can you win the final victory.

short_description: There is a hidden power hidden in a thousand-year-old temple. If you stray into the temple, you will encounter all sorts of strange and inconceivable monsters. If you withdraw, you will only bring death. Only fighting is the root of survival. You take it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590（AMD FX 8350）
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX 480 8GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
